latestInspection.result: Inspection Result:     Compliance Inspection of Open Violations - Reinspection Not Required

infractions.Violation Summary: Aquatics Director is not 21 years of age does not have 3 seasons of relative experience

infractions.Violation Summary: Written Safety Plan incomplete provisions do not address staff facility fire safety medical requirements general and activity specific safety staff training and camper orientation

infractions.Violation Summary: Camp fails to provide one lifeguard for 75 campers when off site facility supplies remainder so as to provide 125 supervision ratio

infractions.Violation Summary: Treansportation equipment not maintained NYS MV or NYS DOT inspection sticker not provided first aid fire extinguisher tools and flares not provided

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service/camp fails to comply with terms of the permit
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Buddy system or other accountability system has not been established System does not contains camper identity ability record of coming and goings buddy assignments  15 minute checks
All camp staff have not had recent medical exam including TB testing as required by the Dept
